alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Milwaukee; Ozaukee; Racine (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued June 17 at 3:11PM CDT until June 18 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Life threatening waves of 4 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Beaches along Lake Michigan in Ozaukee, Milwaukee, Racine, and Kenosha counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM CDT this evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high waves and onshore winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include: North Beach in Port Washington... Big Bay Beach in the Village of Whitefish Bay... Mckinley Beach in Milwaukee... Grant Park Beach in Milwaukee... North Beach in Racine... Wind Point Lighthouse Beach in Racine...
info.instruction: Stay out of the water and away from dangerous areas like piers and breakwalls. Strong structural and longshore currents are expected. Rip currents are possible.
